name: WordPress-Theme-Check-Action
description: Run Theme Check test for a WordPress theme

scripts.install:environment: npm install && npm run wp-env start && npm run activate-theme
scripts.activate-theme: npm run wp-env run cli theme activate test-theme && npm run wp-env run tests-cli theme activate test-theme
scripts.check:theme-check: npm run wp-env run cli eval-file ./actions/theme-check/CheckTheme.php

author: The WordPress Contributors
